entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
